features.name: Ice Pillars
features.flavor: Pillars of ice erupt from the ground and launch your foes into the air.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
The pillars vanish as soon as the effects of the forced movement are resolved.
###### Wall of Ice (9 Discipline)
*You create a wall of ice.*
| **Area, Psionic, Ranged** | **Main action** |
| ------------------------- | --------------: |
| **üìè 10 wall within 10**  |  **üéØ Special** |

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You can place this wall in occupied squares, sliding each creature in the area into the nearest unoccupied space of your choice. The wall remains until the end of the encounter or until you are dying. The wall's squares are treated as stone squares for the purpose of damage, and you and allies can move freely through the wall. Each enemy who enters a square adjacent to the wall and has M < AVERAGE is slowed (save ends). Each enemy who is force moved into the wall and has M < AVERAGE is restrained (save ends).
